title: namAmi shrIman (tv)
sahitya:
namAmi shrIman mahAdEvEndra sarasvati shrI bhagavat pAdAcArya gurO


anupallavi

  ramApati vinuta shrI candramaulIshvara pAdAbja makaranda pAna dhurINa 
kamalAsana mukhajAta sakala vEda vEdAnta tatva pArINa dhurINacaNa
				(svarasAhitya)
guru caraNa sarOruha madhupAna kriti surasana spaTika maNImaya hAragaLa mrdula caraNa


caraNam    sakala shiSya jana hrttApaharaNa shubhakara sadAshiva vinuta sujnAnAlankAra 
sakala hrdaya paNDitOttama samudAya mahatapah-kAya bhavajaya mA pAlaya
